name: Quell
headline: Get fit fighting your way through a fantasy world.
description: Quell is an immersive fitness game where players get fit fighting their way through a fantasy world. Our low-cost wearable uses smart resistance bands to guide you through an exciting, effective combat workout at home. We’re Peloton meets gaming at 1/10th of the price

founders.name: Cameron Brookhouse, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Quell. Ex-McKinsey consultant turned design engineer. Passionate about making boring things fun.

founders.name: Lorenzo Spreafico, Founder
founders.description:
Quell Founder and COO. 
I like making products that improve people's health and wellbeing. Previously a Product Designer.

founders.name: Martin Tweedie, Founder
founders.description: I spent 10 years studying Materials Science at the University of Oxford, initially as an undergraduate, before building novel sensor technology from graphene and other 2D materials as a graduate student. Quell brings together my technical background and interests in gaming and fitness (although we still haven't worked out how to work graphene into this project...).

**Quell: Get Fit Through Gaming**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator Batch S20, Quell is redefining fitness with a unique blend of gaming and at-home workouts. Based in London, this innovative company employs a team of 40 and is helmed by Group Partner Aaron Epstein. 

At its core, Quell aims to help people get fit by navigating through a thrilling fantasy world. Picture this: instead of another dull workout, you’re battling enemies and leveling up your skills while burning upwards of 600 calories an hour. Think of it as Peloton meets gaming, but at a fraction of the cost—10% to be precise.

### The Technology
Quell’s standout feature is its smart resistance bands paired with engaging gaming mechanics. This low-cost wearable technology transforms traditional fitness routines into immersive experiences. The system is adaptive, personalizing workouts to fit individual fitness levels, which ensures that everyone from beginners to seasoned athletes can reap the benefits.

### Current Offerings
Quell has recently launched its **VR Resist**, which allows users to take their favorite VR experiences and convert them into effective resistance training workouts. This innovative approach makes exercising not just bearable, but fun. The flagship game, **Shardfall**, immerses you into an action-packed combat adventure, combining the thrill of gaming with a full-body workout that feels just as engaging as your favorite game.

### What the Buzz is About
Quell has caught the attention of fitness enthusiasts and gamers alike. Media outlets like *Tom’s Guide* and *VentureBeat* rave about how Quell melds rigorous workouts with enjoyable gameplay, making fitness less of a chore and more of a rewarding game. Users can track their progress with detailed analytics, unlocking rewards and customizing their in-game characters as they go.

### Join the Adventure
In just a few years, Quell has positioned itself as an exciting player in the sports-tech and fitness gaming landscape. If you’re looking to level up your workout routine while having a blast, Quell might just be the fitness revolution you didn’t know you were waiting for. Ready to crush your fitness goals? Dive into Quell's community and see where your adventure takes you.

For more information, check out their website: [Quell](https://playquell.com).
